sys_script_include.description: on deand script include to validate email address syntaax using regular expressions
sys_script_include.name: validateEmailAddress

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_6ffc86af1b60001032918733cc4bcbd9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.validateEmailAddress</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>on deand script include to validate email address syntaax using regular expressions</description><name>validateEmailAddress</name><script><![CDATA[function validateEmailAddress(emailStr) {
    // Use JavaScript coercion to guarantee emailStr is a string
    emailStr = emailStr + '';
    // Compare emailStr against the allowed syntax as specified in the regular expression
    // If emailStr has allowed syntax, return true, else return false
    if (emailStr.match(/^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/)) {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-23 14:46:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>6ffc86af1b60001032918733cc4bcbd9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>validateEmailAddress</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6ffc86af1b60001032918733cc4bcbd9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-23 14:46:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
